tables.name: students
tables.table-description: Table containing information about students in the school management system

columns.name: student_id
columns.description: Unique identifier assigned to each student

columns.name: first_name
columns.description: First name of the student

columns.name: last_name
columns.description: Last name of the student

columns.name: date_of_birth
columns.description: Date of birth of the student

columns.name: grade
columns.description: Current grade or class of the student

columns.name: guardian_name
columns.description: Full name of the student's guardian or parent

columns.name: contact_number
columns.description: Contact number of the student's guardian or parent

columns.name: address
columns.description: Home address of the student

tables.name: teachers
tables.table-description: Table containing information about teachers in the school management system

columns.name: teacher_id
columns.description: Unique identifier assigned to each teacher

columns.name: first_name
columns.description: First name of the teacher

columns.name: last_name
columns.description: Last name of the teacher

columns.name: date_of_birth
columns.description: Date of birth of the teacher

columns.name: subject_taught
columns.description: Subject taught by the teacher

columns.name: contact_number
columns.description: Contact number of the teacher

columns.name: address
columns.description: Home address of the teacher

tables.name: courses
tables.table-description: Table containing information about courses offered in the school

columns.name: course_id
columns.description: Unique identifier assigned to each course

columns.name: course_name
columns.description: Name or title of the course

columns.name: course_description
columns.description: Description of the course

columns.name: credit_hours
columns.description: Number of credit hours assigned to the course

columns.name: teacher_id
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the teacher responsible for the course

tables.name: enrollments
tables.table-description: Table containing information about student enrollments in courses

columns.name: enrollment_id
columns.description: Unique identifier assigned to each enrollment

columns.name: student_id
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the student being enrolled

columns.name: course_id
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the course in which the student is enrolled

columns.name: enrollment_date
columns.description: Date when the student was enrolled in the course

tables.name: grades
tables.table-description: Table containing information about student grades in courses

columns.name: grade_id
columns.description: Unique identifier assigned to each grade entry

columns.name: enrollment_id
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the enrollment for which the grade is assigned

columns.name: score
columns.description: Numeric score or grade achieved by the student

columns.name: grade_date
columns.description: Date when the grade was assigned
